name: nba-betting-analysis
description: NBA Monte Carlo betting analysis using official NBA.com API with 100k default / 1M high-precision simulations

scripts.setup:venv: py -3 -m venv .venv && .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -U pip setuptools wheel && .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -U Flask numpy nba_api pandas nbainjuries openpyxl
scripts.setup:unix: python3 -m venv .venv && ./.venv/bin/python -m pip install -U pip setuptools wheel && ./.venv/bin/python -m pip install -U Flask numpy nba_api pandas nbainjuries openpyxl
scripts.install-deps: pip install Flask numpy nba_api pandas nbainjuries openpyxl
